description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the internet shortcut files security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-21412), apply the relevant updates as specified below:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (64-bit or 32-bit).
2. Download and install the appropriate KB update from the links provided.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (64-bit), download: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763).
- For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (64-bit), download: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763).
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (64-bit), download: [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766).
- Ensure that your system meets the prerequisite build numbers indicated for successful installation.

**Preconditions**:
- The system must be running a supported version of Windows as specified.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
